name: pnp-list-formatting-workflow-progress-header
title: Workflow Progress Header
shortDescription: This sample shows a checkmark for each date field that has a value to help convey when milestones have been hit.
longDescription: This sample shows a checkmark for each date field that has a value to help convey when milestones have been hit.

references.name: Configure the list form
references.description: You can configure the list form in a list or library with a custom header, footer and the form body with one or more sections with fields in each of those sections.

references.name: Show or hide columns in a list or library form
references.description: You can show or hide columns in a list or library form as an alternative to deleting them. When you hide a column, it doesn't affect the column or the data in the column, as it would if you delete it.
